item.title: Alfred 3 workflow development
item.description: The free app Alfred is extremely popular and well-known to a lot of Mac users as a simple but powerful tool for automating task/app launching and many others. Since version 3, Alfred has been revamped with even more cool interfaces and features and good integrations with numerous third-party applications.
